channel.title: Proving Grounds Play Writeups on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Proving Grounds Play Writeups on Blog

item.title: DC-1 Writeup
item.description: Despite the name, this is not a Domain Controller and is indeed a Linux box! Starting off with a quick nmap scan of the box: We see 3 services running on the box: 22 - SSH 80 - HTTP 111 - RPCBind What really caught my attention was port 80 since it’s running Drupal, which is an open-source Content Management System (CMS) and nmap is telling us that it’s running version 7 of Drupal which has an SQL injection vulnerability that was dubbed Drupalgeddon!
